name: Spicy Chicken and Tofu Stir-Fry
description: A vibrant stir-fry featuring chicken and tofu, loaded with vegetables for a healthy dish.
steps: 1. Begin by washing the chicken. Cut it into bite-sized cubes.
2. Drain the tofu, then press and cut it into cubes.
3. Peel and slice the onion into thin strips.
4. Peel and finely chop the garlic.
5. Heat 1 tbsp of cooking oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the cubed chicken to the pan and cook for about 5-7 minutes until browned, stirring occasionally.
7. Add the tofu to the skillet and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes until lightly golden.
8. Add the sliced onion and garlic to the skillet. Cook for about 2-3 minutes until the onion becomes translucent.
9. Sprinkle the red pepper powder and salt evenly over the stir-fry and mix well.
10. Drizzle the sesame oil over the stir-fry and toss everything together for another minute.
11. Remove from heat and serve hot.

name: Beef and Potato Stew
description: A hearty stew filled with tender beef and nutritious potatoes and carrots.
steps: 1. Start by cutting the beef into chunks and seasoning with salt.
2. Peel and chop the potatoes into cubes, and slice the carrots into rounds.
3. Peel and chop the onion and garlic.
4. Heat the cooking oil in a large pot over medium heat.
5. Add the beef and sear on all sides, about 5-6 minutes.
6. Add the onion and garlic to the pot and cook for 2-3 minutes until fragrant.
7. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
8. Add the chopped potatoes and carrots, then reduce the heat to low.
9. Cover and let it simmer for about 1 hour or until the beef is tender.
10. Stir occasionally and adjust seasoning if needed before serving.

name: Tomato and Garlic Tofu Soup
description: A comforting and healthy soup combining tofu, garlic, and tomatoes.
steps: 1. Drain the tofu and cut into cubes.
2. Chop the tomatoes and onion, and mince the garlic.
3. In a pot, heat the cooking oil over medium heat.
4. Add the onion and garlic, cooking until the onion is translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes until soft.
6. Pour in the water and bring to a boil.
7. Add the cubed tofu and salt, reduce heat, and simmer for 15 minutes.
8. Taste and adjust seasoning before serving warm.

name: Garlic Beef Stir-Fry
description: A quick and delicious stir-fry featuring tender beef sautéed with garlic and onions.
steps: 1. Slice the beef into thin strips and season with salt.
2. Peel and slice the onion into rings, and mince the garlic.
3. Heat 1 tbsp of cooking oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
4. Add the beef strips and cook for about 3-4 minutes until browned.
5. Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until onion is soft.
6. Drizzle with sesame oil, mixing well, and cook for another minute.
7. Serve hot with a side of vegetables or rice if desired.

name: Carrot and Potato Bake
description: A wholesome baked dish featuring carrots and potatoes seasoned with garlic and onions.
steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes and carrots, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. Peel and chop the onion, and mince the garlic.
4. In a large bowl, combine the potatoes, carrots, onion, garlic, salt, and oil, mixing well.
5. Spread the vegetable mixture evenly on a baking sheet.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until golden and tender, stirring halfway through.
7. Serve warm as a side dish or main course.
